key_title: Key to the species of Thelionema

source.author: Conran, J.G.
source.title: Liliaceae
source.in_title: Flora of Victoria. Vol. 2. Ferns and Allied Plants, Conifers and Monocotyledons
source.citation: Modified from: Conran, J.G. (1994). Liliaceae. In: Walsh, N.G.; Entwisle, T.J. (eds), Flora of Victoria. Vol. 2. Ferns and Allied Plants, Conifers and Monocotyledons. Inkata Press, Melbourne.

leads.lead_text: Inflorescence paniculate, many-flowered; flowers blue or white; leaves mostly more than 4 mm wide when flattened, midrib acutely angled or keeled
Inflorescence umbel-like, simple or up to 3-branched, usually 3–10-flowered; flowers white; leaves to 3 mm wide, midrib ridged but not keeled
